programme.title: Silaw
programme.desc: Six unsuspecting teens are camping on the site of Mt. Lihim ng Aguila when they trip into a missile silo controlled by a discharged ex-general. Will the teens be able to sneak out of the mess alive, or will they be forever trapped?

programme.title: Okey Si Ma'am
programme.desc: Keempee, Donna, Paco and Lander played high school senior students each having their own personal dilemmas. Ms. Sonia (Alice Dixson), with her unorthodox way of teaching became their counselor and friend who brought out the best in her students.

programme.title: Bakit Ikaw Pa Rin?
programme.desc: Paul and Jenny eloped at the tender age of 17 and managed to triumph over their difficulties. Things eventually takes its toll as Paul's sister, Sylvia schemes to separate them.

programme.title: Alabang Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alabang, an upscale suburb on the South of Manila, was the setting for this wacky tale of boys from the wrong side of the tracks, who easily fall for rich and pretty girls, who lived in Alabang.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.

programme.title: Minsan May Pangarap
programme.desc: This is the true story of Aldo Guce and his family, and how they stood upand won against bigotry and the American system of justice. Based on a well-publicized case known among Filipinos in the United States.

programme.title: Unang Tibok
programme.desc: Alona (Miya Nolasco) feels suffocated by her mother's overprotectiveness. Deprived of male company, she answers the first guy who counts her. In trying to control her daughter, the more she is losing her now.

programme.title: Hindi Mo Ako Kayang Tapakan
programme.desc: This is the story of Tacing--a woman involved in different love affairs, which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito, were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.

programme.title: Tagos Ng Dugo
programme.desc: Is it only a coincidence that the murders seem to happen exactly on the days Pina is experiencing her very painful monthly period?

programme.title: Adan Lazaro (Search and Destroy)
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon portrays Adan Lazaro, a highly specialized intelligence agent who returns to his motherland to stop a group of terrorists who are out to wreck havoc to the country's ailing economy.

programme.title: Kanto Boy 2 (Anak Ni Totoy Gwapo)
programme.desc: Guiller, the son of the notorious Totoy Guwapo grew up as an orphan. He ended up in prison after accidentally killing a man in a street fight and it was there that he came to terms with life and discovered his own identity.

programme.title: Bakit Kay Tagal Ng Sandali?
programme.desc: Nina (Dina Bonnevie) and Ted (Julio Diaz) are sweethearts. Ted convinces her to accept Don Edmundo's (Eddie Garcia) suit as the old man is said to be dying anyway.

programme.title: Paano Ang Kahapon... Kung Wala Na Ang Ngayon
programme.desc: Two hearts so much apart of one found love \"Verbotten\" in a world not of their own creation. For they met too early for destiny, too late for happiness.

programme.title: Pipti-Pipti (1 Por U, 2 Por Me)
programme.desc: Jack and Popoy were escaped convicts on the trail of twenty million pesos. Others were also in search of the money but the duo were lucky enough to elude them and discovered the loot buried in some remote town.

programme.title: Ang Pagbabalik Ni Pedro Penduko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) who was decreed by a hermit as the savior of the world, which was under an evil curse. To fulfill his destiny, he had to go back in time and fight with the malevolent pair from hell, Lucifero and Lucifera.

programme.title: Proboys
programme.desc: This is the story of five young women, their adventures and misadventures in their search for Mr. Right.

programme.title: Nang Iniwan Mo Ako
programme.desc: What should a woman do when, one day, the husband whom she built her world around with comes home, unexpectedly, and tells her that hes leaving her for another?

programme.title: Sa Bawat Tunog Ng Kampana
programme.desc: Rodel (Philip Salvador) suspects his father did not die during a mine collapse as his employer Don Gonzalo (Vic Diaz) claims. If we consider that Rodel's father is a cook, the son's suspicions are justified.

programme.title: Isla Paraiso
programme.desc: A series of inexplicable and mind-boggling twists of incidents inside the hacienda take place as the animosity between two sisters heightens.

programme.title: Hulihin Si Boy Amores
programme.desc: A former policeman defies the law and meets a violent death.

programme.title: Brown Ninja
programme.desc: Jun (Dante Varona) barely survives a massacre that wipes out his whole family. He was found by a blind, old man in the woods and is nursed back to health. The old man also teaches him the secrets of being a ninja. Jun makes use of his new skills to find his family's killers and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Ang Kuya Kong Siga
programme.desc: Utoy (Paolo Contis) idolizes his friend and benefactor Johnny (Vic Sotto), whom he looks up to as an older brother. Johnny finds employment as a driver and bodyguard for pretty commercial model Jessica (Christine Jacob).
